text:
:bee: Hot off the press updates updates to boilerplate v3.10.0 (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v3.10.0|minor update>) :bee:
• Adds lazy loading to logo module (yes thats a thing now y’all)
• Adds `hs-button` class to theme button styles 
• Adds version check for search results module on search results template. Adds support for v3 search api.
